question:
Consider the following statements about Members of Parliament Local Area Development Scheme (MPLADS):
  1. Under the scheme, each MP has the choice to suggest to the District Collector for works upto cost of Rs.5 Crores per annum
  2. While the elected members of Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha have to recommend works in districts from where they have been elected, the Nominated Members may select any District in the Country
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
